juzu.plugin.asset

Interface Minifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NormalizeJSMinifier

    public interface Minifier

    The interface implemented by an asset minifier, an asset minifier should implement this interface and provide a public no-arg constructor. Implementations can be used by application in asset declarations.

    Author:
    Julien Viet

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream minify(String name, String type, InputStream stream)
      Minify an asset.

    • Method Detail

      • minify

        InputStream minify(String name,
                 String type,
                 InputStream stream)
                   throws IOException
        Minify an asset.
        Parameters:
        name - the asset value, for instance jquery.js
        type - the asset type: script or stylesheet
        stream - the asset stream
        Returns:
        a stream that will produce the asset
        Throws:
        IOException - any io exception that would prevent minification to happen
